title: Antidepressants and Naltrexone for Stimulant Use Disorder
itunes:title: Antidepressants and Naltrexone for Stimulant Use Disorder
description:
This episode discusses the evidence of mirtazapine, bupropion, and naltrexone for stimulant use disorder. Are these promising treatments? Are they really effective? 

Faculty: Andrew Saxon, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: Experimental Pharmacotherapies for Stimulant Use Disorder
  • Antidepressants and Naltrexone for Methamphetamine Use Disorder
